mapper.sql: T1.number, T1.tag, T1.state, T1.audit_state, T1.pub_time, T1.pub_user_id, T1.province, T1.city, T1.district, T1.street, T1.remark, T1.audit_time, T1.last_update_time, T1.mobile, T1.wx_number, T1.stars, T1.pic_md5,T2.nick_name,T2.head_img_url
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from question T1 LEFT JOIN tuser T2 ON T1.pub_user_id = T2.id
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into question (number, tag, state, audit_state, pub_time, pub_user_id, province, city, district, street, remark, audit_time, last_update_time, mobile, wx_number, stars, pic_md5) values (#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pubUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stars,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
